description: A gentle, feminine Sibylla from an important family. Everyone addresses her as ojou-sama, be it for respect or in a joking manner, but treats her with a degree of deference and softness. She flies with Elly until Elly leaves to go to the Spring, and has a deep knowledge of sibylla traditions. As children, she and Mamina met, but were divided by the class difference between them.
name: Rodoreamon
